doc.previous: Natural language processing NLP is a field of computer science artificial intelligence and computational linguistics concerned with the interactions between computers and human natural languages As such NLP is related to the area of human computer interaction Many challenges in NLP involve natural language understanding that is enabling computers to derive meaning from human or natural language input and others involve natural language generation
